trans-unit.source: Represents a delegate to use for dispatcher operations.
trans-unit.target: 代表要用於發送器作業的委派。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to use this delegate for dispatcher operations, but DispatcherOperationCallback and <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> use dynamic invoking.
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用這個委派發送器作業，但 DispatcherOperationCallback 和<xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>使用動態叫用。</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: Partial Trust applications do not support dynamic invoking, so you must use either DispatcherOperationCallback or <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> if the application is going to be running in Partial Trust.
trans-unit.target: 部分信任應用程式不支援動態叫用，因此您必須使用其中一個 DispatcherOperationCallback 或<xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>如果將應用程式在部分信任中執行。</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>
